mapper.insert: insert into manager_info_tb ( manager_tel, manager_name, manager_avatar, password ) values ( #{managerTel}, #{managerName}, #{managerAvatar}, md5(#{password}) )
mapper.select: select manager_id, manager_name, manager_tel, manager_avatar from manager_info_tb where manager_id = #{managerId}
select manager_id, manager_tel, manager_name, manager_avatar from manager_info_tb where manager_tel = #{managerTel}
select manager_id, manager_tel, manager_name, manager_avatar from manager_info_tb where manager_name like #{managerName}
select manager_id, manager_name, manager_tel, manager_avatar from manager_info_tb
select count(manager_id) from manager_info_tb where manager_id = #{managerId} and password = md5(#{password})
